warning: Please provide information about the article (title, description, snippet) in Polish. It is possible to provide a translation at a later stage of article creation.

image.title: Image Path
image.tooltip: Enter the title of the article photo in the local directory (WITH EXTENSION). It is suggested to seperate words with a hyphen: (exmaple-of-image-path.png).

description.title: Description
description.tooltip: Enter the detailed description of the article.

snippet.title: Snippet
snippet.tooltip: In 2-3 sentences, provide the most important information about the product.

date.title: Date
date.tooltip: Enter the current date. It could be in format: YYYY-MM-DD / DD-MM-YYYY

isFeatured.title: Highlight
isFeatured.tooltip: Should the article be featured on the main page?

isTranslated.title: Translation
isTranslated.tooltip: Should the article be available in English as well? If yes, select this option and fill in the fields in English. IMPORTANT: If translations are not provided and the user changes the language of the page, they will be informed that the article is only available in Polish.

titleEN.title: English Title
titleEN.tooltip: Enter the article title in english.

descriptionEN.title: English Description
descriptionEN.tooltip: Enter the detailed description of the article in english.

snippetEN.title: English Snippet
snippetEN.tooltip: In 2-3 sentences, provide the most important information about the product in english.
